query.sql: select * from ( SELECT f.function_id id, concat('M',f.function_module) pid, f.jsp_pager url, f.function_des TEXT, f.priority FROM SYS_FUNCTION f,sys_power p WHERE f.function_id = p.function_id AND p.role_id =${@role_id} AND p.enable_flag='Y' #AND_CLAUSE# UNION ALL SELECT concat('M',m.module_id) id, NULL pid, NULL url, m.module_name TEXT, m.priority FROM sys_module m WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM SYS_FUNCTION f, sys_power p WHERE f.function_id = p.function_id AND p.role_id = ${@role_id} AND p.enable_flag = 'Y' AND m.module_id = f.function_module) ) v order by pid desc ,v.priority
